Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameEntity
      • Enemy

  • public class Enemy
extends GameEntity
    Author:
    ayule801 super class that represents the enemies that the player needs to fight

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy()
      Creates a default enemy object that has velocity,health, damage, direction at a random location.
      Enemy(double x, double y, int maxHealth)
      Creates a default enemy object that with x/ y coordinates, health, damage, direction, and a bounding Rectangle
      Enemy(double x, double y, int maxHealth, int rectWidth, int rectHeight)
      Creates an enemy object that has a custom x/ y coordinate health, damage, direction, and a bounding Rectangle certain location

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(double x,
             double y,
             int maxHealth,
             int rectWidth,
             int rectHeight)
        Creates an enemy object that has a custom x/ y coordinate health, damage, direction, and a bounding Rectangle certain location
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this enemy
        y - the y coordinate of this enemy
        rectWidth - the width of the Rectangle that Bounds this Enemy
        rectHeight - the width of the Rectangle that Bounds this Enemy
        maxHealth - the health of this enemy
